item.title: Ubuntu Error Log
item.description: error list 1. E: Unable to locate package xxxxxx # version: 12.04 # lang: en sudo apt-get install phpmyadmin Reading package lists... Done Building dependency tree Reading state information... Done E: Unable to locate package phpmyadmin 分析: 1.如果修改了source.list还没有update，请up

item.title: 在ubuntu上安装kvm
item.description: Install Necessary Packages sudo apt-get install qemu-kvm libvirt-bin ubuntu-vm-builder bridge-utils Add Users to Groups sudo adduser `id -un` libvirtd Verify Installation virsh -c qemu:///system list Install virt-manager (graphical user interface) sudo apt-get install virt-manager Creating virtual machines #!/bin/bash set -x sudo virt-install \ --connect qemu:///system \ --name ubuntu \ --ram 1024 \ --disk path=/var/lib/libvirt/images/ubuntu.img,size=15 \ --network network:default \ --cdrom=/path-to-iso-file/ubuntu-12.04-desktop-i386.iso \ --os-variant=ubuntuprecise \ --accelerate Cloning a virtual machine virt-clone -o ubuntu
